dcterms:creator: S. Nah
T. H. Kim
K. M. Lee
dcterms:description: GoPro is a commonly used motion deblurring dataset that contains 2,103 image pairs for training and 1,111 pairs for evaluation. The dataset synthesizes input blurry images from a sequence of frames captured at 240 fps using a GOPRO camera, averaging varying numbers of successive frames to produce blurs of different strengths.
dcterms:title: GoPro

dcterms:creator: Z. Shen
W. Wang
X. Lu
J. Shen
H. Ling
T. Xu
L. Shao
dcterms:description: HIDE is a dataset for human-aware image deblurring, consisting of densely annotated foreground human bounding boxes. The blurry images in HIDE are synthetic, created similarly to the GoPro dataset.
dcterms:title: HIDE
